clang-analyzer-optin.taint.TaintedAlloc.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-optin.taint.TaintedAlloc
Check for memory allocations, where the size parameter might be a tainted
(attacker controlled) value.
The
clang-analyzer-optin.taint.TaintedAlloc
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-optin.taint.TaintedAlloc.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
